entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 16 except 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 16 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
